com.pasdam.regexren.gui.rules

Class ChangeCaseFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pasdam.regexren.gui.rules.AbstractRuleFactory
      • com.pasdam.regexren.gui.rules.ChangeCaseFactory

  • public class ChangeCaseFactory
extends AbstractRuleFactory
    AbstractRuleFactory used to create rules to change case of the name/extension
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    paco

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      • setOperation

        public void setOperation(int operation)
                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                         java.util.regex.PatternSyntaxException,
                         java.lang.NullPointerException
        Sets the operation type
        Parameters:
        operation - operation type
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified operation is not a supported type ( OPERATION_TO_LOWERCASE, OPERATION_TO_UPPERCASE, OPERATION_CAPITALIZE_WORDS or OPERATION_CAPITALIZE_SENTENCES)
        java.util.regex.PatternSyntaxException - if regex it true and the sentence separator is an invalid regular expression
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if regex is true and the sentence separator is null

        Throws:

      • setRegex

        public void setRegex(boolean regex)
              throws java.util.regex.PatternSyntaxException,
                     java.lang.NullPointerException
        Sets whether the sentence separator is a regular expression or not
        Parameters:
        regex - true if the sentence separator is a regular expression, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.util.regex.PatternSyntaxException - if regex it true and the sentence separator is an invalid regular expression
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if regex is true and the sentence separator is null

      • isRegex

        public boolean isRegex()
        Returns true if the sentence separator is a regular expression
        Returns:

      • getRule

        public static Rule getRule(int target,
                           int operation,
                           java.lang.String sentenceSeparator,
                           boolean regex)
                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Factory method that creates the correct rule based on the parameters values
        Parameters:
        target - - target of the operation (name/extension), use ChangeCasePanel constraint to set this.
        operation - - kind of operation, use ChangeCasePanel constraint to set this.
        sentenceSeparator - - separator used to split sentences, used only for the operation "Capitalize sentences"; default ".".
        regex - - if true sentenceSeparator will be interpreted as a regular expression; it will be ignored if target is TARGET_EXTENSION
        Returns:
        the correct rule based on input parameters
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if target or operation parameter is unknown
